10 #include "ucl_basic_drone/basic_drone_controller.h"
11 
12 BasicController::BasicController()
13 {
14  // Subsribers
15  pose_channel = nh.resolveName("ucl_basic_drone/pose_estimation");
16  pose_sub = nh.subscribe(pose_channel, 10, &BasicController::poseCb, this);
17 
18  // Publishers
19  control_channel = nh.resolveName("cmd_vel");
20  vel_pub = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>(control_channel, 1);
21 
22  takeoff_channel = nh.resolveName("ardrone/takeoff");
23  takeoff_pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Empty>(takeoff_channel, 1, true);
24 
25  land_channel = nh.resolveName("ardrone/land");
26  land_pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Empty>(land_channel, 1);
27 
28  toggleState_channel = nh.resolveName("ardrone/reset");
29  toggleState_pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Empty>(toggleState_channel, 1, true);
30 
31  // Services
32  startControl_ = nh.advertiseService("drone_ucl/start_control", &BasicController::startControl, this);
33 
34  stopControl_ = nh.advertiseService("drone_ucl/stop_control", &BasicController::stopControl, this);
35 
36  setAltRef_ = nh.advertiseService("drone_ucl/set_alt_ref", &BasicController::setAltRef, this);
37 
38  // Parameters
39  alt_ref = 500; // default altitude reference (unit: mm)
40  isControlling = false;
41 }
42 
43 BasicController::~BasicController()
44 {
45 }
46 
47 bool BasicController::startControl(std_srvs::Empty::Request& req, std_srvs::Empty::Response& res)
48 {
49  ROS_INFO("calling service start");
50  takeoff_pub.publish(std_msgs::Empty());
51  ros::Duration(10).sleep(); // Wait for 10s
52  isControlling = true;
53  return true;
54 }
55 
56 bool BasicController::stopControl(std_srvs::Empty::Request& req, std_srvs::Empty::Response& res)
57 {
58  ROS_INFO("calling service stop");
59  isControlling = false;
60  land_pub.publish(std_msgs::Empty());
61  return true;
62 }
63 
64 bool BasicController::setAltRef(ucl_basic_drone::SetAltRef::Request& req, ucl_basic_drone::SetAltRef::Response& res)
65 {
66  ROS_INFO("calling service set_alt_ref");
67  alt_ref = req.z;
68  res.status = true;
69  return true;
70 }
71 
72 void BasicController::reguAltitude(double* zvel_cmd, double alt_mes, double alt_ref)
73 {
74  // a stupid controller
75  if (alt_mes < alt_ref)
76  {
77  *zvel_cmd = 0.5;
78  }
79  else
80  {
81  *zvel_cmd = -0.5;
82  }
83  // Looking for a pid ? http://wiki.ros.org/pid
84 }
85 
86 void BasicController::sendZVelToDrone(double zvel_cmd)
87 {
88  geometry_msgs::Twist cmdT;
89  cmdT.angular.z = 0;
90  cmdT.linear.z = zvel_cmd;
91  cmdT.linear.x = 0;
92  cmdT.linear.y = 0;
93 
94  // assume that while actively controlling,
95  // the above for will never be equal to zero, so i will never hover.
96  cmdT.angular.x = cmdT.angular.y = 0; // TODO: good idea ?
97 
98  if (isControlling)
99  {
100  vel_pub.publish(cmdT);
101  }
102 }
103 
104 void BasicController::poseCb(const ucl_basic_drone::Pose3D::ConstPtr posePtr)
105 {
106  lastPoseReceived = *posePtr;
107 }
108 
109 void BasicController::controlLoop()
110 {
111  double zvel_cmd;
112  reguAltitude(&zvel_cmd, lastPoseReceived.z, alt_ref);
113  sendZVelToDrone(zvel_cmd);
114 }
115 
117 void basicSigintHandler(int sig) // FIXME cannot have another signature ...
118 { // cannot be member of BasiController
119  // Land before shutdown
120  // land_pub.publish(std_msgs::Empty()); // HOW TODO ?
121  ros::shutdown();
122 }
123 
124 int main(int argc, char** argv)
125 {
126  ros::init(argc, argv, "basic_drone_controller", ros::init_options::NoSigintHandler);
127  BasicController bc;
128  signal(SIGINT, basicSigintHandler);
129  ROS_INFO_STREAM("basic_drone_controller started!");
130  while (ros::ok())
131  {
132  bc.controlLoop();
133  ros::spinOnce(); // if we dont want this we have to place callback and services in threads
134  }
135  return 0;
136 }
